en.title: Electron Soundboard
en.content: Nice looking Soundboard with recording and hotkey functionality built with Electron (react/typescript).

en.title: Pong AI
en.content: Neuro Evolving Pong AI implemented with the python NEAT algorithm and library. In only a few generation, a fluid gameplay is possible

en.title: Command line Tuner and Pitch game
en.content: CLI tool/game where you have to play the right frequency into your microphone. Detection works using Fast Fourier Transform.

en.title: Funzel Newspaper Magazine

en.title: Graduation Book
en.content: Maybe someone will show this their children when they grow older, I certainly won't - it looks amazing from a design perspective though..
